Question: VANPOWERS CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Vanpowers

Product: GrandTeton and UrbanCross E-Bikes

- GrandTeton: all-terrain mountain e-bike, 130Nm motor, 20mph speed, removable 692Wh lithium-ion battery, Tektro 4-piston hydraulic disc brakes, 110 miles range, 120mm travel air suspension fork, weight capacity up to 400lbs
- UrbanCross: lightweight road e-bike, Shimano® GRX groupset, flared gravel handlebar, advanced gravel frame, up to 62 miles range, agile handling, suitable for urban and gravel roads
- Both models integrate advanced smart security system with features such as hub motor lock, emergency SOS, vibration detector, real-time GPS tracking, and geofencing
- Vanservice offers extensive warranty and repair services, including 14/7 customer support and up to six years of parts coverage
- Available for pre-order later in 2024
- Vanpowers focuses on cutting-edge technology, rider safety, and environmental sustainability, with supply chains and local warehouses across the U.S. and Europe
Summary_cn:
Vanpowers

产品：GrandTeton和UrbanCross电动自行车

- GrandTeton：全地形山地电动自行车，130牛米电机，20英里/小时速度，可拆卸的692瓦时锂离子电池，Tektro 4活塞液压碟刹，110英里续航里程，120mm行程气动减震前叉，最大承重能力达400磅
- UrbanCross：轻量级公路电动自行车，Shimano® GRX传动系统，扩散式碎石把手，先进的碎石车架，最高62英里续航里程，灵活操控，适用于城市和碎石路
- 两款型号均集成先进的智能安全系统，包括轮毂电机锁定、紧急SOS、震动检测器、实时GPS跟踪和地理围栏等功能
- Vanservice提供全面的保修和维修服务，包括14/7客户支持和长达六年的零件保修
- 2024年晚些时候开始预售
- Vanpowers专注于先进技术、骑行者安全和环境可持续性，在美国和欧洲拥有供应链和本地仓库。
